primaryBuyer.name: The Awakened Healer
primaryBuyer.relationship: Married or in long-term partnership, often with children

psychographics.identity: She already identifies as a healer, empath, or intuitive — she just hasn't formalized it yet
psychographics.spiritualJourney: She's had her own spiritual awakening (often triggered by loss, illness, divorce, or burnout) and feels called to help others through similar transformations
psychographics.currentState: Working a soul-draining job or staying home, feeling unfulfilled. She knows she's meant for 'something more' but doesn't know how to make it real
psychographics.coreDesire: To turn her spiritual gifts into a legitimate, income-generating healing practice — while being present for family
psychographics.biggestFear: That her gifts 'aren't real enough,' that she's not qualified, or that people will judge her
psychographics.innerNarrative: I've always known I was different. I feel things others don't. I want to help, but I don't know if I can make a career out of it

segments.name: The Natural Empath
segments.description: Highly sensitive, intuitive. Has always 'felt' things. Often an informal healer among friends and family. Never formalized her gifts.
painPoints: Doesn't know how to channel her gifts professionally
segments.buyingTrigger: Validation that her gifts are real + a structured path to turn them into a practice

segments.name: The Burnout Transformer
segments.description: Former healthcare worker, teacher, or corporate professional who hit burnout wall. Had a spiritual awakening. Ready for soul-aligned work.
painPoints: Exhausted from years of giving in unfulfilling roles
Felt a spiritual calling but ignored it for 'practical' reasons
Wants meaningful work that doesn't drain her
segments.buyingTrigger: A legitimate path that bridges her professional credibility with her spiritual calling

segments.name: The Yoga/Wellness Expander
segments.description: Already in wellness (yoga, meditation, massage, Reiki). Wants to deepen her offerings with spiritual healing. Looking to differentiate and increase income.
painPoints: Income plateau in current wellness practice
Clients asking for deeper healing she's not trained in
Wants a credential to validate expanded offerings
segments.buyingTrigger: A credential that adds authority + opens new revenue streams

segments.name: The Second Chapter Seeker
segments.description: Empty nester or life-transition woman (divorce, kids leaving, retirement). Wants purpose in her next chapter. Drawn to spiritual work as a calling.
painPoints: Feels lost after major life transition
Has time and desire but no direction
Doesn't want another corporate job — wants something with soul
segments.buyingTrigger: A structured path that gives her identity, community, and income in one package

segments.name: The Spiritual Curious
segments.description: Newer to spiritual healing. Interested but unsure. Usually enters through the free mini-diploma to 'test the waters.'
painPoints: Doesn't know if this is 'for her'
segments.buyingTrigger: A low-risk, free entry point that proves the value before asking for commitment

primary: Purpose and calling — 'I was meant for this'
Validation — 'My gifts are real and valuable'
Freedom — 'Work from home, set my own schedule'
Legacy — 'I want to leave the world better than I found it'
secondary: Being a role model for daughters/children
Belonging to a community of like-minded women

top5.reframe: The wellness industry is $5.6T. Spiritual healing is one of the fastest-growing segments. Practitioners are earning $50-200/session.

top5.objection: I don't have any formal training
top5.reframe: That's exactly what this diploma gives you — structured training that turns your natural gifts into professional skills.
The women in our program felt the same way. Now they have waiting lists. The credential gives you the confidence to silence doubt.

top5.objection: I can't afford it right now
top5.reframe: The mini-diploma is completely free. It's designed for you to experience the transformation before making any investment.

top5.objection: I've tried other programs that didn't work
top5.reframe: This isn't a generic course. It's accredited, mentor-led, and built for women exactly like you who are ready to go from gift to practice.

hooks: You've always felt things others couldn't explain
Your gift isn't a coincidence — it's a calling
She went from 'too sensitive' to certified healer
What if the thing that makes you 'different' is your greatest asset?
Stop hiding your light. Start healing others.
urgencyExamples: The longer you wait, the more people miss the healing you were born to give
Your spiritual gifts don't have an expiration date — but your window of courage does
Every day you don't step into your calling is a day someone doesn't get healed
